item.title: The U.S. Sends Lots of Plastic Trash Overseas. Malaysia Just Said No Thanks.
item.description: No country receives more discarded plastic from wealthy countries, but shipments from the United States are no longer welcome.

item.title: Differences Over Policy Bill Reignite the Trump-Musk Feud
item.description: President Trump ratcheted up his rhetoric against Elon Musk, at one point suggesting that he could be interested in attempting to deport him.

item.title: Ford Foundation’s New Leader Is From Yale Law School
item.description: Heather K. Gerken, the dean of the law school, will run the powerful philanthropy, known for pushing for social justice.

item.title: What’s in the Trump Policy Bill?
item.description: We take a closer look at some less discussed provisions.

item.title: Thought Markets Were Volatile in the First Half? Watch Out.
item.description: Stocks have rebounded, but the dollar is in a deep slump. Here’s what could go right (and very wrong) for investors.
